attributes.action: Start paying domiciliary care worker travel time as normal wages
attributes.additional_details: Domiciliary worker are working 7 days a week starting 6 in the morning ending at 10 pm, and their travel time is unpaid, Though they are working 20 hours a day they are paid for like 4-5 hours which doesnot seem fair .

rejection.details:
Workers are already entitled to be paid for all working time, which includes travelling in connection with work, including travelling from one work assignment to another.

If an employer fails to do this you can raise this with either Acas or HMRC: https://www.gov.uk/pay-and-work-rights
